page.title: 03THE CLERK TO THE COUNCIL
page.content: Mr. Brown is the clerk to {Burnham {Parish Council. }He works in an office at{Burnham Park Hall.}He's worked at Burnham for 19 years. He's worked for a community for 35 years. His job iq a profession and his salary is paid by the council from our rates. He works from 9 till 5 daily. He deals with lots of things e.g.:house planning, wedding receptions, sports fields, steet lighting and all kinds of public services. He meets all kinds of people. He travels a lot and has many meetings. He chose this job because it is a specialised one and he had lots of experience. Every 4 years somebody is elected to work with him,
